title: Ticket #7041: command to query CredD OAuth is registered wrong authorization level
description: The daemoncore command ZKM_QUERY_CREDS to the CredD is invoked by a user tool (condor_submit) and should be registered as a "WRITE"-level command, not a DAEMON-level command.
remarks:
CODE_REVIEW : change looks good.

2019-May-15 11:19:03 by tim:
No doc needed. Decided at team meeting 2019-05-15
check_ins: 2019-May-08 16:26   Check-in [56819]: change authorization level of ZKM_QUERY_CREDS to WRITE. #7041 (By zmiller )
